verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [V: questioned] [ARG2: the Trump administration and the ACLU] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG1: over a proposed ban separating parents from their children at the border] .
A federal judge questioned the Trump administration and the ACLU on Friday over a [V: proposed] [ARG1: ban] separating parents from their children at the border .
A federal judge questioned the Trump administration and the ACLU on Friday over [ARG0: a proposed ban] [V: separating] [ARG1: parents] [ARG2: from their children] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
